title: Who Runs Faster?
description: How fast can you run? Have you ever raced someone to see who was faster? Read Who Runs Faster? to see how the speed of one animal compares to another. Vivid photographs and a repetitive text structure will support beginning readers. The book can also be used to teach students about comparing and contrasting as well as how to use complete sentences.
reviewWords: antelope, cheetah, faster, run, squirrel, tortoise
